flawed_nl_solution:
Earl was on the 1 + 5 = <<1+5=6>>6th floor after going up 5 floors.
When he went down 2 floors, he was on the 6 - 2 = <<6-2=7>>7th floor.
Since he went up 7 floors, he was then on the 7 + 7 = <<7+7=14>>14th floor.
Since he is 9 floors away from the top of the building, therefore the building has 14 + 9 = <<14+9=23>>23 floors.
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
